description: The second TaxonWorks Annual Awards! To help celebrate over 11 years of development behind TaxonWorks and its community we look forward to this fun light-hearted event that recognizes the diverse contributions to our community. We ask anyone connected to our network to nominate folks. Winners all receive TaxonWorks swag. Please join us in congratulating everyone and thanks for your nominations and awardee updates coming from the broader community.
title: Awards
